title: Digi-Key
description:
Digi-Key's app for Android phones and tablets gives you instant access to one of the world's largest inventories of in-stock electronic components. Find and order the electronic components you need whether you're at work, at home, or on the go! Features: 
- Search and filter over 4 million products by category 
- Get detailed product specifications and photos
- View and save datasheets on your device
- See real time pricing and stock availability
- Use the barcode scanner to find parts quickly 
- Create lists of parts using multiple shopping carts and place orders
- Sign in to your Digi-Key account to view your profile, order history, packing lists, and more 

Tell us about your experience! Rate our app, use the Contact Us feature, or reach us at mobile@digikey.com
what_is_new:
3.3.5
- Updated order history
- Updated datasheet list for tablets
3.3.0
- New search! You can now repeat searches you've made in the past with search history.
- Swipe to delete. Swipe left on search history items or datasheets to delete them.
- Bug fixes
3.2.1
- Built-in barcode scanner for search and packing lists for easier scanning.
- Pre-Marshmallow apps now require the camera permission for the new barcode scanner.
- Feedback now allows screenshots to be attached.
- Bug fixes
